abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second
            Multi-Sectoral HIV/AIDS Project for Ethiopia is to increase
            access to prevention services for youth; in particular
            females aged 15-24, and other most-at-risk groups. The
            extension is necessary to allow the completion of an ongoing
            survey that is intended to provide updated data to assess
            the status of the Project Development Objective (PDO)
            indicators. In keeping with Bank guidelines, the task team
            confirms that: (i) the objectives of the project continue to
            be achievable; (ii) the project continues to be implemented
            satisfactorily; and (iii) the borrower has prepared an
            acceptable action plan to ensure project completion. This
            will be the second extension of the project.
